name: A Murderer In Heaven
description:
Hello everyone!

Our group is called Rocket Cock Studios and for today we have a prototype that we've developed during our semester for our Masters Degree in Design and Development of Digital Games, in the university known as UBI, in Covilhã, Portugal.

This prototype is known as "A Murderer In Heaven" and it follows the story of a detective who is capable of solving crimes in his dreams.

The game contains various types of mechanics, different camera changes, several monologues and a voice over for each one and an incredible map with highly detailed objects!

It's both a high poly and low poly game, which will certainly please everyone.

Don't hesitate in trying "A Murderer In Heaven" and we hope you love playing it just as much as we loved developing it.
